00034 void
00035 MMLText::layout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00036         // check for entities
00037 /*      conv = d;
00038         conv.resolveEntities();*/
00039         gui->ascent = a->p->fontAscent();
00040         gui->descent = a->p->fontDescent();
00041         gui->width = a->p->stringWidth(conv);
00042         widthset = heightset = false;
00043 
00044         // update the charens vector
00045         uint size = d.length();
00046         charends.resize(size);
00047         for (uint i=0; i<size; i++) {
00048                 DOMString before = d.substr(0, i+1);
00049                 charends[i] = a->p->stringWidth(before);
00050         }
00051 }
00052 void
00053 MMLText::paint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00054         a->p->translate(gui->x, gui->y);
00055         int nearness = -1;
00056         MathCursor *mc = owner->cursor();
00057         nearness = mc->nearness(this);
00058         bool selected = mc->isSelected(this);
00059         if (selected) {
00060                 // the node can be completely or partially selected
00061                 float x1 = 0;
00062                 float x2 = gui->width;
00063 //              printf("selected!");
00064                 if (mc->left().container() == this) {
00065 //                      printf(" o1: %i,", mc->left().offset());
00066                         // the side to the right of offset is selected
00067                         x1 = getCursorX(mc->left().offset());
00068                 }
00069                 if (mc->right().container() == this) {
00070                         // the side to the left of offset is selected
00071                         x2 = getCursorX(mc->right().offset());
00072 //                      printf(" o2: %i,", mc->right().offset());
00073                 }
00074                 a->p->fillRect(x1, -gui->ascent, x2-x1, gui->ascent + gui->descent,
00075                         a->p->selectionColor());
00076 //              printf("\n");
00077         } else if (nearness >= 0 && mc->collapsed()) {
00078                 MathColor mb = a->p->highlightColor(nearness);
00079                 a->p->fillRect(0, -gui->ascent, gui->width,
00080                         gui->ascent + gui->descent, mb);
00081         }
00082         if (widthset) {
00083                 if (heightset) {
00084                         a->p->drawText(conv, gui->width, gui->ascent,
00085                                 gui->descent);
00086                 } else {
00087                         a->p->drawText(conv, gui->width);
00088                 }
00089         } else {
00090                 if (heightset) {
00091                         a->p->drawText(conv, gui->ascent, gui->descent);
00092                 } else {
00093                         a->p->drawText(conv);
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         if (nearness == 0) {
00097                 float cx = getCursorX(mc->offset());
00098                 a->p->drawLine(cx, -gui->ascent, cx, gui->descent, 2);
00099         }
00100         a->p->translate(-gui->x, -gui->y);
00101 }
00102 float
00103 MMLText::getCursorX(uint offset) const {
00104         float cx;
00105         if (offset == 0) {
00106                 cx = 0;
00107         } else if (offset == d.length()) {
00108                 cx = gui->width;
00109         } else {
00110                 cx = charends[offset-1];
00111         }
00112         return cx;
00113 }
00114 void
00115 MMLText::setWidth(float w) const {
00116         gui->width = w;
00117         widthset = true;
00118 }
00119 void
00120 MMLText::setHeight(float a, float d) const {
00121         gui->ascent = a;
00122         gui->descent = d;
00123         heightset = true;
00124 }
00125 long
00126 MMLText::getOffset(float x) const {
00127         uint size = charends.size();
00128         float mid = 0;
00129         for (uint i=0; i<size; i++) {
00130                 mid = mid + (charends[i]-mid)/2;
00131                 if (x < mid) return i;
00132                 mid = charends[i];
00133         }
00134         mid = mid + (gui->width-mid)/2;
00135         if (gui->x < mid) return size;
00136         return size+1;
00137 }
